= IDE Installation =

  # Download the Eclipse J2EE: [http://www.eclipse.org/downloads/packages/eclipse-ide-java-ee-developers/heliossr1 Eclipse J2EE]
     * We are using a version: eclipse-jee-helios-SR1-macosx-cocoa.tar.gz
  # Install [http://wso2.org/library/carbon-studio Carbon-Studio]. Carbon Studio is a complete Eclipse based SOA development environment for Carbon platform from WSO2. This Bundle is composed by:
     * Eclipse BPEL Design
     * Apache ODE Server
     * WSO2 Plugins

= Tomcat and ODE Installation =

  # Download the apache tomcat 5.5.
  # Download the apache ode 1.3.5.
